column4: hey people..i am having some issues with my new kernel 2.6.27-7 should i uninstall it and install the old one 2.6.24-21??
we might know better if you described what your issues are
well i am unable to connect to internet...coz i can't find any eth0 network interface specified when i run ifconfig
which is not a problem of the Kernel maybe but more likely your net configuration file
Well when i was using hardy earlier and upgraded to 24-21 then i had the same problem..so since then i have been using 24-19..
I thought it was some bug in the kernel..but whatever it is..has switched to the new kernel..when i upgraded to intrepid..
*shrugs* that is some weird issue alright... do you mind to post in the Forums? It doesn't look like anybody in here could help you OR anybody even follows the happenings in this channel, so :P
newaz..at least you can help me with the sound problem i m having..i am unable to get any sound..when i play a song..
hmm... what does 'asoundconf list' spit out?
hmm... righto... are you using GNOME or KDE?
let me tell you something imp..
'sudo asoundconf set-default-card Intel'? I have no idea otherwise

earlier everything was working fine..then i switched to 27-7 and there the sounds weren't working so i changed the settings in Preferences->Sound to some HDA oss instead of ALSA...and when i clicked Test i heard a beep so i thougt that everything was working fine..
but when i switched back to 24-19 i didn't worked even after changing the settings back to the earlier one..
